  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_105676</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Iron-sulphur reaction</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisen-Schwefel Reaktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">réaction de Fer-soufre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">reação do Ferro-enxôfre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">reazione dello Ferro-zolfo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση σίδηρος-θείου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">reacción del Hierro-sulfuro</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Last of three word equations showing an incorrect way to describe the chemical reaction between iron and sulphur.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">chemical reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron sulphide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Sulphur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">word equation</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Letzt von drei Wortgleichungen, die eine falsche 
Methode zeigen, die chemische Reaktion zwischen Eisen und Schwefel zu 
beschreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dernier de trois équations de mot montrant une 
voie incorrecte de décrire la réaction chimique entre le fer et le 
soufre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Último de três equações da palavra que 
mostram uma maneira incorreta descrever a reação química entre o 
ferro e o enxôfre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ultimo di tre equazioni di parola che mostrano un
modo errato descrivere la reazione chimica fra ferro e zolfo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαρκέστε τριών εξισώσεων λέξης που εμφανίζουν 
ανακριβή τρόπο να περιγραφεί η χημική αντίδραση μεταξύ του 
σιδήρου και του θείου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pasado de tres ecuaciones de la palabra que 
muestran una manera incorrecta de describir la reacción química 
entre el hierro y el sulfuro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">chemische Reaktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eisensulfat</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">fer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Soufre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
